name: nipahtv
description: Better Kick and 7TV Emote Integration for Kick
author: Xzensi

scripts.watch:dev-esbuild: nodemon --watch src -e ts --exec npm run dev-esbuild
scripts.preesbuild: npm run tsc && npm run update-build-header && rm -f dist/client.user.js && cat build-tasks/compile_header >> dist/client.user.js
scripts.build: npm run sass && npm run esbuild
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others "npm run watch:dev-esbuild" "npm run watch:sass" "npm run serve-files"
scripts.startWithTsc: concurrently --kill-others "npm run watch:tsc" "npm run watch:dev-esbuild" "npm run watch:sass" "npm run serve-files"
